topic.fullpath: Topic :: System :: Systems Administration :: Authentication/Directory :: LDAP

name: OpenOTP Authentication Plugin Wordpress
short_description:
This Plugin enables strong two factor authentication for admins and users. It displays an overlay on Challenge-Response session, after fill in username and password. The plugin supports global, per role and per user settings configuration. The plugin will transparently handle any OpenOTP Login Mode including, LDAP only, OTP only and LDAP+OTP.

OpenOTP is the RCDevs user authentication solution. OpenOTP is a server application which provides multiple (highly configurable) authentication schemes for your LDAP users, based on one-time passwords (OTP) technologies and including: - OATH HOTP/TOTP/OCRA Software/Hardware Tokens - Google Authenticator - Mobile-OTP (mOTP) Software Tokens - SMS One-Time Passwords - Mail / Secure Mail One-Time Passwords - Yubikey
OpenOTP provides both SOAP/XML and RADIUS client APIs.
summary: OpenOTP authentication native plugin for Wordpress 3.x
